name: Catacomb Kittens
description:
Short and sweet platformer done in 48h for Game Jam 19 - Ocean + Monde Perdu (my first jam!).

Made almost from scratch with Master System palette and resolution.

Have Fun and give feedbacks!

----------------------------------------------------------

-If you die without a checkpoint left in the level, it's Game Over!

-M to mute sound

-P to go Fullscreen

-Controllers and touchscreens should works too!

-----------------------------------------------------------

POST JAM UPDATE: Lil' update to add more comfort and less frustration. There won't be any more update since I want it to stay close to what was originally posted for the Jam. But stay tuned, I may redo everything properly in Godot one day!
